references.paper_title: Numerical resolution of an "unbalanced" mass transport problem
references.reason: This paper is foundational for unbalanced optimal transport, which is a key component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Sinkhorn Distances: Lightspeed Computation of Optimal Transport
references.reason: This work introduced the entropic regularization of optimal transport, which is crucial for the efficiency of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Unbalanced optimal transport: geometry and Kantorovich formulation
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for unbalanced optimal transport, addressing a key limitation of traditional optimal transport methods.

references.paper_title: Optimal entropy-transport problems and a new Hellinger-Kantorovich distance between positive measures
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel distance metric based on optimal transport, which is relevant to the proposed method's flexibility in handling different cost functions.
This paper introduced the flow matching framework, which is central to GENOT's ability to learn stochastic transport plans.
